welcome_message_body: Welcome to Sunnyvale, where the sun shines bright and the charm of Silicon Valley awaits you. Get ready to explore our beautiful parks, vibrant downtown, and innovative tech scene â€“ we hope you have a wonderful time discovering all that our city has to offer.
